      • postPersonWithAddressAndPhone

        @POST
 @Path(value="/add")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response postPersonWithAddressAndPhone(String content,
                                                                                                                                                                        @QueryParam(value="phone")
                                                                                                                                                                        int phonenumber,
                                                                                                                                                                        @QueryParam(value="pdescription")
                                                                                                                                                                        String pdescription,
                                                                                                                                                                        @QueryParam(value="street")
                                                                                                                                                                        String street,
                                                                                                                                                                        @QueryParam(value="sinfo")
                                                                                                                                                                        String sinfo,
                                                                                                                                                                        @QueryParam(value="zipcode")
                                                                                                                                                                        String zipcode,
                                                                                                                                                                        @QueryParam(value="city")
                                                                                                                                                                        String cityname)
                                                                                                                                                                 throws InputException
        Adds a person with given personal information.
        Parameters:
        content - Data in Json format.
        phonenumber - - Phone number
        pdescription - - Phone description
        street - - Name of street and number
        sinfo - - Type of street
        zipcode - - Zipcode of city
        cityname - - Name of city
        Returns:
        Builds the information.
        Throws:
        InputException - - If the given information is invalid ie. letters instead of numbers.

      • editPerson

        @PUT
 @Path(value="/edit/{id}")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response editPerson(String content,
                                                                                                                                                          @PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                                                                                          int id)
                                                                                                                                                   throws PersonNotFoundException
        Used to edit information on an existing person.
        Parameters:
        content - Data in Json format
        id - Person id
        Returns:
        The edited person object.
        Throws:
        PersonNotFoundException - If the given id does not correlate to an existing person, the exception is thrown.
